files.docs:
List of files to include. Can be one of:
  * list of file paths
  
  * list of objects containing `path` and `vars`
  
  

*See also: [Packages](https://esphome.io/components/packages.html#configuration-variables)*

password.docs:
**, string**: Password to be used for authentication, if required.

*See also: [Packages](https://esphome.io/components/packages.html#configuration-variables)*

ref.docs:
**, string**: The Git ref(erence) to be used when pulling content from the repository.

*See also: [Packages](https://esphome.io/components/packages.html#configuration-variables)*

refresh.docs:
**, [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)**: The interval at which the content from the repository should be refreshed.

*See also: [Packages](https://esphome.io/components/packages.html#configuration-variables)*

url.docs:
**, string**: The URL for the repository.

*See also: [Packages](https://esphome.io/components/packages.html#configuration-variables)*

username.docs:
**, string**: Username to be used for authentication, if required.

*See also: [Packages](https://esphome.io/components/packages.html#configuration-variables)*
